events.event_name: Art N Art National Level Art Exhibition & Competitions
events.description: Nav Shri Art & Culture Organises the annual 'Art N Art' National Level Art Exhibition and multiple all-India painting and craft competitions including online and child art contests. These provide national platforms for painters, sculptors, and craft makers to exhibit their work and compete for recognition and prizes. Official details and participation instructions are available via the organization's event pages.

Dastkar is a nationally recognized craft organization that regularly organizes craft bazaars and exhibitions featuring artisans from across India. These events promote traditional and contemporary crafts including textiles, pottery, jewellery and more. Artisans can showcase and sell their work to urban buyers and collectors. Visit the official site for current and upcoming event details.

Art Alive Gallery hosts recurring art exhibitions and shows across major cities like New Delhi and Mumbai. These exhibitions spotlight contemporary and traditional artists, providing exposure to collectors and art buyers.
